jcr:content.jcr:title: List of political parties in the Bahamas

contentheadline.headline: List of political parties in the Bahamas

contentrichtext.text: {{Politics of the Bahamas|}} '''Political parties in the Bahamas''' exist within a [[two-party system]], in that there are two dominant [[political party|political parties]], with extreme difficulty for candidates to achieve electoral success under the banner of any other party. ==Active parties== ===Major=== *[[Free National Movement]] *[[Progressive Liberal Party]] ===Minor=== *[[Democratic National Alliance (Bahamas)|Democratic National Alliance]] ==Defunct parties== *[[United Bahamian Party]] *[[National Development Party (Bahamas)|National Development Party]] *[[National Democratic Party (Bahamas)|National Democratic Party]] *[[Labour Party (Bahamas)|Labour Party]] *[[Social Democratic Party (Bahamas)|Social Democratic Party]] *[[Poor Powerful Peoples Party]] *[[Workers' Party (Bahamas)|Workers Party]] *[[Independent (politician)|Independent]] *[[Coalition for Democratic Reform]] *[[Vanguard Party]] *[[Bahamian National Party]] *[[Bahamas Democratic Party]] *[[Bahamas Democratic Movement]] ==See also== * [[List of political parties]] {{Bahamas topics|state=uncollapsed}} {{Bahamian political parties}} {{North America in topic|List of political parties in}} [[Category:Lists of political parties|Bahamas]] [[Category:Political parties in the Bahamas| ]] [[Category:Bahamas politics-related lists|Political parties]] [[Category:Lists of organisations based in the Bahamas|Political parties]]
